title: Saint Bernards vision: Or, A brief discourse, dialogue-wise, between the soul and body of a damned man, newly deceased, laying the faults one upon the other. To which is added, a speech of the devil's in Hell, &c. To the tune of, Flying fame, &c.
publisher: Printed by and for W.O. and are to be sold by the booksellers of Pye-corner and London-bridge.,
